CustomField.description: This field is a formula field used primarly for reports. If the Stored Location = "Other", it will display the Other Store Location field (text field). Otherwise it will display the Stored Location (picklist field)
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( StoredLocation__c, "Other" ), OtherStorageLocation__c, TEXT( StoredLocation__c) )
CustomField.label: Store Location
